title: 3 Port HDMI Pigtail Switch with 50 cm HDMI Cable
description: High performance HDMI Switcher Easily switches three sources to one display. Key-press-switching function and intelligent function. With one fixed HDMI cable (pigtail) this converter not only reduces cost but also save time for consumers.HDMI Switcher routes high definition video (in multiple resolutions up to 1080p) and digital audio from any one of the three sources to display units. All inputs accommodate the connections of the high definition video sources simultaneously, compatible well for HD-DVD,SKY-STB, PS3, Xbox 360.Output sends high definition audio/video signals to a high definition display.Features:Support High Speed HDMI specification (Version 1.3b);Support highest video resolution 1080p;Support 250MHz/2.5Gbps per channel (7.5Gbps all channel) bandwidth; Support 12bit per channel (36bit all channel) deep color;HDCP pass-through; Support uncompressed audio such as LPCM;Support compressed audio such as DTS Digital, Dolby Digital including DTS-HD and Dolby True HD. NOTE: Even though HDMI cables support Hot Plug Detection, improper usage might result in resetting / restarting both devices, or even may cause damage to the devices. Therefore, we do not suggest Hot Plug action for any HDMI cables. Please make sure both input and output devices are off when plugging or unplugging HDMI cables.
